name: Hathor
title: Hathor - Goddess of Love & Joy | Egyptian Mythology
subtitle: Goddess of Love, Joy, Music, Beauty, and Motherhood
shortDescription: Hathor is the cow-horned goddess of love, beauty, music, dance, motherhood, and joy. Mother or wife of Horus (depending on tradition), she could transform into Sekhmet when angered. Patron of miners, musicians, and dancers. The Eye of Ra in wrathful form, but usually benevolent goddess who brings joy and abundance.
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Hathor .
